channel.title: Docker on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert

item.title: Mastering PostgreSQL: more about the docker image
item.description: The Enterprise Edition of Mastering PostgreSQL in Application Development ships with a docker image that hosts both a PostgreSQL server instance with a pre-loaded database, the one that’s used throughout the book examples, and also with a Jupyter Network notebook that hosts SQL queries thanks to the sql_magic plugin.
